ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="u">Karolinska Institutet, Alzheimer Neurobiology Center, Department of Geriatric Medicine, Karolinska University Hospital Huddinge, Stockholm, Sweden</subfield>     <subfield code="a">Nordberg, Agneta</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="773" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="b">Karger</subfield>     <subfield code="t">Alzheimer's and Parkinson's Diseases: Mechanisms, Clinical Strategies, and Promising Treatments of Neurodegenerative Diseases</subfield>     <subfield code="z">3318023914</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="520" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a"><p>The&nbsp;time&nbsp;course&nbsp;and&nbsp;order&nbsp;of&nbsp;the&nbsp;pathological\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdphysiological&nbsp;processes&nbsp;in&nbsp;Alzheimer&acute;s&nbsp;disease&nbsp;(AD)&nbsp;is&nbsp;still&nbsp;under&nbsp;investigation&nbsp;and&nbsp;it&nbsp;is&nbsp;expected&nbsp;that&nbsp;molecular&nbsp;imaging&nbsp;will&nbsp;provide&nbsp;important&nbsp;insight&nbsp;into&nbsp;early&nbsp;brain&nbsp;pathology.&nbsp;Multi\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdtracer&nbsp;PET&nbsp;tracer&nbsp;studies&nbsp;visualizing&nbsp;fibrillar&nbsp;amyloid,&nbsp;inflammatory&nbsp;changes&nbsp;including&nbsp;astrocytosis&nbsp;and&nbsp;activation&nbsp;of&nbsp;microglia&nbsp;as&nbsp;well&nbsp;as&nbsp;cerebral&nbsp;glucose&nbsp;metabolism&nbsp;indicate&nbsp;that&nbsp;AD&nbsp;pathological&nbsp;processes&nbsp;are&nbsp;initiated&nbsp;and&nbsp;are&nbsp;on-going&nbsp;in&nbsp;decades&nbsp;before&nbsp;onset&nbsp;of&nbsp;cognitive&nbsp;symptoms.&nbsp;Prevention&nbsp;might&nbsp;therefore&nbsp;be&nbsp;a&nbsp;new&nbsp;promising&nbsp;target&nbsp;for&nbsp;AD&nbsp;therapy.</p></subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="245" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">Molecular imaging in sporadic and at genetically risk populations of Alzheimer\ufffd\ufffds disease</subfield>
